resources.string:
1. Select an app 
2. Enter trigger words (like your name, nickname or any other word) 
3. Select vibration pattern 
4. You can optionally set up pinging for notifications from individual channels (like chatroom or dm's from someone)
 
Your phone will vibrate with custom vibration when app's notification contains the trigger word

For this app to work you must give it a permission to read notification content.

In the "Notification read, reply \& control" permission settings select OhMyPing app and turn on "Allow notification access"

You also might need to open app's info page in settings and enable 'Allow restricted options'
This app is already in the list
You must have at least one app listener enabled
